description:
The Casting Couch series is a great way to find possible new talent for Hogtied. We get so many applications from beautiful, sexy woman & we can only choose a few to do full shoots with. All of the CC girls are one of the following, some are all at once; New to BDSM, new to bondage, new to porn and ALL are new to Kink.com. Since they are untested we give them a small taste of what our shoots are like to see how they react. Some will make it, others, maybe not. This is YOUR chance as a member to help us choose new girls to shoot.
Thea is an LA porn star & stripper. Sexy, perky, hot & with a killer ass. She had never been tied up before she came in for her audition so I gave her a small sample of what it is like. She ws actually a bit nervous and smiled the whole time.
title: Amateur Casting Couch: Thea Marie... stripper/porn star, new bondage slut
